description: 30 days of Python programming challenge is a step-by-step guide to learn the Python programming language in 30 days. This challenge may take more than100 days, follow your own pace. These videos may help too:
🚀 A simple way to launch, train, and use PyTorch models on almost any device and distributed configuration, automatic mixed precision (including fp8), and easy-to-configure FSDP and DeepSpeed support
Composio equips agents with well-crafted tools empowering them to tackle complex tasks
🤗 Transformers: State-of-the-art Machine Learning for Pytorch, TensorFlow, and JAX.
An open platform for training, serving, and evaluating large language models. Release repo for Vicuna and Chatbot Arena.
ms-swift: Use PEFT or Full-parameter to finetune 300+ LLMs or 40+ MLLMs. (Qwen2, GLM4, Internlm2.5, Yi, Llama3, Llava, MiniCPM-V, Deepseek, Baichuan2, Gemma2, Phi3-Vision, ...)
AWS zero to hero repo for devops engineers to learn AWS in 30 Days. This repo includes projects, presentations, interview questions and real time examples.
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU acceleration

为GPT/GLM等LLM大语言模型提供实用化交互接口，特别优化论文阅读/润色/写作体验，模块化设计，支持自定义快捷按钮&函数插件，支持Python和C++等项目剖析&自译解功能，PDF/LaTex论文翻译&总结功能，支持并行问询多种LLM模型，支持chatglm3等本地模型。接入通义千问, deepseekcoder, 讯飞星火, 文心一言, llama2, rwkv, claude2, moss等。
fabric is an open-source framework for augmenting humans using AI. It provides a modular framework for solving specific problems using a crowdsourced set of AI prompts that can be used anywhere.
